net.openhft.chronicle.salt

Class EasyBox.KeyPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.salt.EasyBox.KeyPair
  • Enclosing class:
    EasyBox

    public static class EasyBox.KeyPair
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to handle KeyPair creation Explicitly named static methods are provided to help avoid mistakes from calling the wrong constructor overload Constructors in turn are made private

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      EasyBox.PublicKey publicKey 
      EasyBox.SecretKey secretKey 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EasyBox.KeyPair deterministic(net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.BytesStore seed)
      Generate deterministic public/private key pair from BytesStore accessing full 32 seed bytes
      static EasyBox.KeyPair deterministic(long id)
      Generate deterministic public/private key pair from simple long id (which only uses 8 out of 32 seed bytes)
      static EasyBox.KeyPair generate()
      Generate random public/private key pair
      void wipe()
      safely wipe the memory backing the secret part of this key pair when finished

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Generate deterministic public/private key pair from BytesStore accessing full 32 seed bytes
        Parameters:
        seed - - deterministic BytesStore seed, which should be at least 32 bytes
